trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Denton
There was one other sighting in Denton on or around July 25th 2012
Summary: 2nd night in a row seeing triangle object hover & project beam/laser like lights
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsObserved a triangle object in the sky last night, hovering & shooting beams. So, me and some friends looked up again tonight & it was there again! Triangle shop, hovering & then moving in fast random motions & slowed motions. Seems to have "headlight" at the top of triangle, at one point glowed orange & "shot out" beams of red. I started watching it at around 10 something, it is now 1:20am & i can still see the object but, it has "calmed" going much slower, no fast movements & seems to be getting farther away.
